text: A peace is of the nature of a conquest for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser.
author: William Shakespeare

text: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: He that would live in peace and at ease must not speak all he knows or all he sees.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: A people free to choose will always choose peace.
author: Ronald Reagan
